originalText.text: Scam, don’t waste your money! They take your money and won’t send you tickets. Ruined our special day! They promised to deliver tickets the day before the event, however, they cancelled the transaction 2 HOURS before the show and said they were unable to deliver. Very disappointing.

text.text: Scam, don’t waste your money! They take your money and won’t send you tickets. Ruined our special day! They promised to deliver tickets the day before the event, however, they cancelled the transaction 2 HOURS before the show and said they were unable to deliver. Very disappointing.

originalText.text:
Terrible service, did not receive tickets. Story below.

I purchased 2 tickets to an NHL game about 5-10 minutes after the game started using sitix and told I will receive an email with the tickets shortly. I then left my house, picked up a friend and drove to the game. I paid 30$ for parking and then waited for 15 min to receive the tickets. I then called the support line and asked when I will receive the tickets. The lady asked for my confirmation number and said she was going to put me on a brief hold. I asked her if she would be quick (because at this point the game was half over) and she re assured me she would be quick and I have nothing to worry about so I said okay. She left me on hold for 45 minutes and then hung up. I then called back and waited on hold for another 30 mins and then got hung up on again. Frustrated, I dove home and figured I’d call a 3rd time for the heck of it and went right to voicemail so I went to bed. Surprisingly, when I woke up the next day, the tickets still weren't there. I had also received a text from my cell phone provider saying I have been charged 30$ for long distance calls as your agents had left me on hold for over an hour and a half which made me extremely mad. I am now out 27$ for tickets, 30$ for parking, and 32$ for long distance calls because I chose to use sitix. Definitely do not use
